'''1.21.131''' is an upcoming minor update to ''[[Minecraft Education]]'' set to release in January 2026. It adds features from '''[[The Copper Age]]''' and '''[[Mounts of Mayhem]]''' game drops.<ref>{{citation|url=https://edusupport.minecraft.net/hc/en-us/articles/360047556451-Minecraft-Education-Change-Log|title=Minecraft Education Change Log|website=edusupport.minecraft.net|author=Justin}}</ref>

== Changes ==

=== General ===
* Python Notebooks has been removed as a supported IDE.
* Dedicated Server updates.

== Fixes ==
* Further improvements in performance and product stability.
* Bugfixes and stability improvements.</onlyinclude>
